plot: At midnight the biggest movie of all time will open to thousands of theaters across the country, but this is a story of a theater in LA and the people who are waiting in line to see the movie.
title: The Midnight Screening
plot_es: At midnight the biggest movie of all time will open to thousands of theaters across the country, but this is a story of a theater in LA and the people who are waiting in line to see the movie.
plot_en: At midnight the biggest movie of all time will open to thousands of theaters across the country, but this is a story of a theater in LA and the people who are waiting in line to see the movie.
